refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the interfaces which are implemented by the given class or interface

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
object_or_class
An object (class instance) or a string (class or interface name).
autoload
Whether to autoload if not already loaded.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
An array on success, or &false; when the given class doesn't exist.
